class myway.apps.planning.models.Plan(**values)¶

Bases: mongoengine.document.Document

exception DoesNotExist¶

Bases: mongoengine.queryset.DoesNotExist

exception Plan.MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: mongoengine.queryset.MultipleObjectsReturned

Plan.author¶

A unicode string field.

Plan.description¶

A unicode string field.

Plan.details¶

A list field that wraps a standard field, allowing multiple instances of the field to be used as a list in the database.

Plan.id¶

An field wrapper around MongoDB’s ObjectIds.

class myway.apps.planning.models.PlanElement(**values)¶

Bases: mongoengine.queryset.DoesNotExist

PlanElement.activities¶

An embedded document field. Only valid values are subclasses of EmbeddedDocument.

PlanElement.end¶

A datetime field.

PlanElement.id¶

An field wrapper around MongoDB’s ObjectIds.

PlanElement.place¶

A reference to a document that will be automatically dereferenced on access (lazily).

PlanElement.start¶

A datetime field.

tests Module¶

This file demonstrates writing tests using the unittest module. These will pass when you run “manage.py test”.

Replace this with more appropriate tests for your application.
